solution_line_template: The {num_gifts} gifts will use {num_gifts} x {ribbon_per_gift} = <<{num_gifts}*{ribbon_per_gift}={total_ribbon_used}>>{total_ribbon_used} yards of ribbon.
So, {total_ribbon} - {total_ribbon_used} = <<{total_ribbon}-{total_ribbon_used}={ribbon_left}>>{ribbon_left} yards of ribbon will be left.
